name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Python Developer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development, focusing on high-performance solutions in healthcare and finance industries. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, **Flask**, and **FastAPI**, with advanced skills in **CI/CD** processes and **Docker** for streamlined deployment. Experienced in leveraging cloud services, particularly **AWS**, for scalable application architectures. Strong understanding of Agile methodologies, ETL processes, and using technologies such as **Spark**, **Airflow**, **dbt**, and **Databricks** for data processing and analytics.

My background encompasses robust application development using **SQL** and integration of AI capabilities to enhance applications. With a solid foundation in building compliant applications, I ensure robustness and security through the use of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, contributing to the development of enterprise-grade platforms aligned with standard compliance requirements.

Implemented agile **CI/CD** pipelines leveraging tools like **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, focusing on automated testing and multi-environment deployments to enhance development efficiency by **30%**.
Utilized **Docker** for containerization of applications, achieving easier deployment and management in various environments, thus improving delivery speeds by **25%**.
Designed and executed ETL pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **dbt** for efficient data processing and transformation, facilitating large-scale data integration across systems with a reduction in processing time by **40%**.
Developed data models and maintained SQL databases such as PostgreSQL, ensuring data integrity and supporting complex query optimization for transactional systems with millions of records.
Engaged in collaboration within an **Agile** environment, participating in sprint planning and retrospectives to continuously improve team productivity and product quality.
Integrated advanced analytical capabilities by implementing AI features to enhance business insights and decision-making processes, contributing to a **20%** increase in operational efficiency.
Researched and implemented solutions involving **Vector DB** for enhanced data retrieval and performance in machine learning applications.
Contributed to the development of machine learning models that improved accuracy in predictive analytics for finance and healthcare use cases using libraries such as scikit-learn and TensorFlow.
Employed **AWS** for managing cloud-based resources, ensuring seamless deployment and scalability of applications, while adhering to security standards and best practices.

• Lead the implementation of **CI/CD** pipelines with tools like **Docker**, resulting in a **25%** reduction in deployment times and enhanced team productivity.

Utilized **Python** frameworks including **Django**, **Flask**, and **FastAPI** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **high availability** and **low latency** across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.

Employed **Docker** for containerization of applications, ensuring consistent environments from development to production.
Developed scalable data workflows utilizing SQL and **Vector DB** technologies to support data-driven decision-making processes.
Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
Built responsive applications leveraging **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit**, resulting in fast, engaging user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Leveraged **AWS** cloud services for scalable hosting solutions, ensuring robust performance and cost efficiency across all operations.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines utilizing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to enhance search relevance and increase conversion rates.
Designed efficient ETL processes using **Apache Airflow** and **Databricks**, improving data quality and accessibility.
